name: Watch
description: ChunkWatchEvent.Watch is fired when an EntityPlayer begins watching a chunk. This event is fired when a chunk is added to the watched chunks of an EntityPlayer in PlayerChunkMapEntry.addPlayer(EntityPlayerMP) and PlayerChunkMapEntry.sentToPlayers() . This event is not Cancelable . This event does not have a result. HasResult This event is fired on the MinecraftForge.EVENT_BUS .
